column4: i had my mouse working for a long time, and on the last restart it stopped working, can anyone point me in the direction of finding a cause?
did you change your xorg.conf file
no, not before that restart, later i tried a reconfigure with no effect
try cat /var/log/Xorg.0.log|grep mouse might tell you something
is that file only in existance when ubuntu is loaded?
im in windows right now and i can't see that file on my linux partion
it is the log file for the last loading of xorg
alright i'll try and get that for you, hold on a sec
Xorg.0.log is last log there are others you might look at
well i have to restart to get them, anything else i should check?
would you like to see a pastebin?
it is configured as ps2 mouse is that what you have
yes, i dont think the Xorg config is bad, it worked before hand
and im positive i have not changed it
then i do not think i can help perhaps someone else might be able too. hope you find the problem :)
just want to double check ps2 is the normal mouse connection right? as opposed to serial or usb...?
